channel.title: How to change special emotes
channel.description: Too many of my emotes do the same special.. How do i fix? Ive tried client.java but anything i change doesnt work.

item.title: How to change special emotes
item.dc:creator: @Pouch Pouch
item.description:
@Pouch wrote:

setAnimation(576);

the 576 is the animation(emote) its doing you may switch as to your liking.

specGFX(576);

576 Is the GFX your using when your doing a special, you may want to switch that to your liking.

You could find new numbers for emotes and GFX in a list, probably hiding somewhere in MoparScape.

Read full topic

item.title: How to change special emotes
item.dc:creator: @PaidPerPk PaidPerPk
item.description:
@PaidPerPk wrote:

}
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 667 && specialAmount > 99){
AttackingOn2.playerLevel[1] -= hitDiff;
AttackingOn2.sendQuest("" + AttackingOn2.playerLevel[0] + “”, 4004);
AttackingOn2.sendQuest("" + AttackingOn2.playerLevel[1] + “”, 4008);
AttackingOn2.sendQuest("" + AttackingOn2.playerLevel[2] + “”, 4006);
AttackingOn2.sendQuest("" + AttackingOn2.playerLevel[4] + “”, 4010);
AttackingOn2.sendQuest("" + AttackingOn2.playerLevel[5] + “”, 4012);
AttackingOn2.sendQuest("" + AttackingOn2.playerLevel[6] + “”, 4014);
setAnimation(576);
specialAmount -= 100;
lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis();
specGFX(576);
getHit(10);
specOn = true;
